00013 int main(void)
00014 {
00015         UInt8 servo = 0;
00016         UInt8 low_speed = 1;
00017         UInt8 high_speed = 7;
00018         
00019         InitUART0(19200);
00020 
00021         SendString("Test servomotor...\r\n");
00022 
00023         // init dualpob servomotor hardware
00024         InitDualServo();
00025 
00026         SendString("Init dualservo ok\r\n");
00027 
00028         while(1)
00029         {
00030                 // set servo 0 to 1 at low speed
00031                 SetServo(servo,1,low_speed);
00032 
00033                 Wait_Ms(500);
00034 
00035                 // set servo 0 to 250 at high speed
00036                 SetServo(servo,250,high_speed);
00037 
00038                 Wait_Ms(500);
00039         }
00040 
00041         return 0;
00042 }
